name: Demonument
description:
Description

Demonument is a short reverse horror game, take control of the Demonument as you hunt down the humans who invade your domain!

Hide on the grass to blend in and avoid detection as you wait for the right time to strike. But be warned, if you are seen on the path well equipped humans will not hesitate to shatter your fragile physical vessel.

Consume all human souls to win the game.

Controls

Movement: W,A,S,D Keys

Restart: R Key

Quit to Menu: ESCAPE Key
